channel.title: dRoPpInG? HeLp Me!
channel.description:
hey ive been editing my server, and now when you drop someting, or someone else dorps something, basicly if anythings on the ground, and you try to pick it up? you either get connection lost, or nothing happens. help? thanks.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 06, 2008, 11:53:07 pm[/size][hr]EDIT:
also, for instance, i dropped a holiday item, you get by talking to a npc. your only supposed to get the item once, and if u drop it now, u cant get another.
